task.en: I need to demonstrate how CSV format stores data. Now there's an open presentation and a spreadsheet. Please help me save this spreadsheet in CSV format to the desktop, name it "Final.csv" and copy its original contents into the designated spot in the presentation.
task.zh: 我要给人展示csv格式是怎么存储文件的。现在有一个演示文稿和一个表格是打开的。请帮我把这个表格以csv的形式保存到桌面，命名为Final.csv，然后把它的原始内容复制到演示文稿里的指定位置。
task.ar: أحتاج إلى توضيح كيفية تخزين تنسيق CSV للبيانات. يوجد عرض تقديمي وجدول بيانات مفتوح الآن. الرجاء حفظ جدول البيانات بتنسيق CSV على سطح المكتب، تسميته "Final.csv"، ونسخ محتوياته الأصلية إلى الموضع المخصص في العرض التقديمي.
task.ja: CSVフォーマットがデータをどう保存するかを説明する必要があります。現在、プレゼンテーションとスプレッドシートが開いています。このスプレッドシートをCSV形式でデスクトップに保存し、「Final.csv」という名前をつけてください。元の内容をプレゼンテーションの指定箇所にコピーしてください。
task.ru: Я должен продемонстрировать, как формат CSV сохраняет данные. Сейчас открыта презентация и таблица. Пожалуйста, помогите мне сохранить эту таблицу в формате CSV на рабочем столе, назовите ее "Final.csv" и скопируйте ее оригинальное содержимое в указанное место в презентации.

pre_command.en: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "Bold Color"}' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default body item of the current slide of the front document to "Substitute the text here with the raw CSV example"' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default title item of the current slide of the front document to "An Example How CSV Stores Data"' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell (make new document with properties {document template:template "Blank"}) to tell table 1 of sheet 1 to set {column count, row count, header row count, header column count} to {2, 4, 0, 0}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Alice"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Bob"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Charlie"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A4" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Average"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "91"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "97"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "95"'
pre_command.zh: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "粗体（彩色）"}' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default body item of the current slide of the front document to "Substitute the text here with the raw CSV example"' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default title item of the current slide of the front document to "An Example How CSV Stores Data"' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell (make new document with properties {document template:template "空白"}) to tell table 1 of sheet 1 to set {column count, row count, header row count, header column count} to {2, 4, 0, 0}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Alice"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Bob"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Charlie"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A4" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Average"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "91"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "97"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "95"'
pre_command.ar: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "لون جريء"}' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default body item of the current slide of the front document to "Substitute the text here with the raw CSV example"' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default title item of the current slide of the front document to "An Example How CSV Stores Data"' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell (make new document with properties {document template:template "فارغ"}) to tell table 1 of sheet 1 to set {column count, row count, header row count, header column count} to {2, 4, 0, 0}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Alice"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Bob"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Charlie"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A4" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Average"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "91"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "97"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "95"'
pre_command.ja: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "ボールドカラー"}' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default body item of the current slide of the front document to "Substitute the text here with the raw CSV example"' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default title item of the current slide of the front document to "An Example How CSV Stores Data"' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell (make new document with properties {document template:template "空白"}) to tell table 1 of sheet 1 to set {column count, row count, header row count, header column count} to {2, 4, 0, 0}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Alice"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Bob"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Charlie"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A4" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Average"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "91"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "97"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "95"'
pre_command.ru: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to make new document with properties {document theme:theme "Разноцветная"}' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default body item of the current slide of the front document to "Substitute the text here with the raw CSV example"' -e 'tell application "Keynote" to set the object text of the default title item of the current slide of the front document to "An Example How CSV Stores Data"' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to tell (make new document with properties {document template:template "Пустой"}) to tell table 1 of sheet 1 to set {column count, row count, header row count, header column count} to {2, 4, 0, 0}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Alice"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Bob"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Charlie"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "A4" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "Average"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B1" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "91"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B2" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "97"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to set value of cell "B3" of table 1 of sheet 1 of document 1 to "95"'

grading_command: cat /Users/ec2-user/Desktop/Final.csv 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Alice,91" && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to get the object text of the default body item of the current slide of the front document' | tr '\n' '#' | grep -q "Alice,91#Bob,97#Charlie,95#Average," && echo "True" || echo "False"
